title: thebitcoinhole
author: thebitcoinhole
content: Our website https://thebitcoinhole.com/ compares more than 30 hardware wallets, feature by feature.We want to have the most complete and accurate website to compare hardware wallets. Our goal is to help you to choose the correct wallet to buy. So, we are offering 5000 sats to each person that finds an error on our website.Here you can see the rules of the program: https://thebitcoinhole.com/bug-bounty
